name: High Speed Bike Rush Racing
description:
A endless racing game with different levels and in different view modes. This is future generation game who love thrill with drive.select your bike and ride on city and off road and highways and run a race through traffic over take the traffic and bikes collect points and get rewards.
This High Speed Bike Rush Racing game is very interesting for those who are searching for challenging heavy traffic racing games.

High Speed Bike Rush Racing! Wanted to test your driving skills? You think you are good at handling traffic when it comes to road driving and racing? Then you are really wrong, because we bring you Bike Racing in Traffic game, to test and challenge your driving skills. You were lagging the fun of these amazing spectacular crashes with realistic physics, real-time car deforming effects, fire, explosions and sparks. You are definitely going to forget all primitive racing, drifting, augmented reality car racing 3D, High Speed Bike Rush Racing.

It is an amazing 3D environment game. It is mainly designed for bike racing and bike riding. It has stunning realistic graphics to amuse you while you are on the bike to ride on. But overall, the game difficulty is set in the way that it is not so easy to get away from the road. So, you have to be a real racing hero to get through the levels of the game.

Features:
* Attractive and interesting user interface,
* Lively and real-life like HD graphics including real city maps and environment,
* You can at random change the bikes to add more fun,
* Interesting and intriguing game sound,
* Enjoys fun with new GUI system,
* You can get to play with so many bikes,
